testcase.name: App routing > renders Home on /
App routing > renders Login on /login
App routing > renders Register on /register
App routing > wraps /listings in ProtectedRoute and renders Listings
App routing > wraps /listings/:id in ProtectedRoute and renders ListingDetails
App routing > wraps /profile in ProtectedRoute and renders Profile
AuthProvider + useAuth > initially loads current user and sets loading=false afterwards
AuthProvider + useAuth > sets user=null if getCurrentUser throws
AuthProvider + useAuth > login() updates user and isAuthenticated
AuthProvider + useAuth > logout() clears the user
AuthProvider + useAuth > throws if useAuth is used outside AuthProvider
authService > registerUser sends correct request and returns user on success
authService > registerUser throws error with API message when registration fails with message
authService > registerUser throws default message when registration fails without message
authService > registerUser throws default message when error body is not JSON
authService > loginUser sends correct request and returns user on success
authService > loginUser throws error with API message when login fails with message
authService > loginUser throws default message when login fails without message
authService > getCurrentUser returns user when response is 200 OK
authService > getCurrentUser returns null when response is 401
authService > getCurrentUser throws error when response is not ok and not 401
authService > logoutUser sends POST and resolves when response is ok
authService > logoutUser resolves even when response status is 204
authService > logoutUser throws error when response is not ok and not 204
Button > renders a button with default props
Button > applies ghost variant classes
Button > applies rounded-md radius
Button > merges custom className
Button > passes through additional props
Card > renders children
Card > applies default classes
Card > merges custom className
CityCombo > shows placeholder and syncs input with value prop
CityCombo > filters options based on input and respects limit
CityCombo > shows 'No matches' when there are no matches
CityCombo > calls onChange and closes list when an option is clicked
CityCombo > closes dropdown when clicking outside
CityCombo > supports keyboard navigation and Enter to select
CityCombo > closes dropdown and clears active index on Escape
Container > renders children
Container > applies the layout classes
ErrorBoundary > renders children when no error occurs
ErrorBoundary > shows fallback UI when a child throws
ErrorBoundary > calls console.error when an error is caught
FiltersPanel > renders with default title
FiltersPanel > renders with a custom title
FiltersPanel > sets the aria-label based on the title
FiltersPanel > renders children inside the panel
FiltersPanel > applies a custom className
FiltersPanel > renders the icon
FiltersPanel > renders structural elements (header, content, divider)
FiltersPanel > matches snapshot
Footer > renders current year
Footer > renders Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn links
Footer > contains correct social URLs
Footer > matches snapshot
Home page > shows loading then renders PropertyGallery when listings load
Home page > shows error message when listings fetch fails
Home page > shows empty state when no listings are returned
Home page > navigates to /listings with query and filters when searching
Input > renders with base classes and placeholder
Input > merges custom className
Input > forwards other props (type, onChange, value etc.)
ListingDetails > shows loading skeleton initially then renders listing details on success
ListingDetails > shows error state when fetch fails
ListingDetails > returns null when there is no data (e.g. if id is missing) - no crash
ListingDetails > renders map iframe when lat and lon are provided
Listings page > loads listings and shows gallery after skeleton
Listings page > shows error state when listings fetch fails
Listings page > shows empty state when no listings are returned
Listings page > requests the next page when clicking Next (pagination)
Listings page > performs search and includes q param in API call
Listings page > switches to map view when Map button is clicked
Listings page > starts directly in map view when view=map in URL
Login page > renders layout with navbar, footer, and form fields
Login page > calls login with email and password and redirects on success
Login page > shows error when login throws with a specific message
Login page > shows generic error when login throws without a message
Login page > clears previous error when resubmitting
Login page > shows backend string error when login throws with response.data as string
Login page > shows backend message when login throws with response.data.message
MapWithListings > filters out items without valid coordinates
MapWithListings > sets bounds when there are valid items
MapWithListings > does not set bounds when there are no valid items
MapWithListings > uses activeId to change marker opacity
MapWithListings > calls onPreview when a marker is clicked
MapWithListings > renders popup content and calls onPreview when 'Quick preview' clicked
MapWithListings > uses default details link when getDetailsHref is not provided
MapWithListings > uses custom getDetailsHref when provided
MapWithListings > calls onBoundsChange on move/zoom events
Navbar > shows login icon when user is NOT authenticated
Navbar > shows user info and logout when authenticated
Navbar > navigates to /login when unauthenticated user icon is clicked
Navbar > navigates to /profile when authenticated user is clicked
Navbar > calls logout and navigates to /register
Navbar > matches snapshot
Page wrapper > renders children
Page wrapper > applies custom className
Page wrapper > has correct base layout classes
Page wrapper > matches snapshot
Profile page > shows login required message when user is not logged in
Profile page > renders profile info when user is logged in (with Unknown member date fallback)
Profile page > formats and displays member since date when createdAt is provided
PropertyCard (Vitest) > renders the property title
PropertyCard (Vitest) > renders the property location
PropertyCard (Vitest) > renders the property price
PropertyCard (Vitest) > renders the image with correct src & alt
PropertyCard (Vitest) > wraps everything in a correct <Link>
PropertyCard (Vitest) > includes hover-related classes
PropertyCard (Vitest) > matches snapshot
PropertyGallery > renders 'No properties found.' when items is an empty array
PropertyGallery > renders 'No properties found.' when items is undefined at runtime
PropertyGallery > renders a grid of PropertyCard components for each item
PropertyGallery > stretches each card to full height in its column
PropertyGallery > matches snapshot
ProtectedRoute > shows loading state when auth is loading
ProtectedRoute > navigates to /register when not authenticated
ProtectedRoute > renders children when authenticated
Register page > renders layout, section, and registration UI
RegisterForm > renders all fields and submit button
RegisterForm > submits form successfully and shows success message
RegisterForm > shows loading state while submitting
RegisterForm > shows error message when registration fails
RegisterForm > falls back to generic error message if error has no message
RegisterForm > shows backend string error when response.data is a string
RegisterForm > shows backend message when response.data.message is provided
SearchBar > renders the input field
SearchBar > updates the input value
SearchBar > calls onSearch with the current input value
SearchBar > does not throw if onSearch is undefined
SearchBar > matches snapshot
SearchFiltersAdvanced > shows the correct price label based on minPrice/maxPrice
SearchFiltersAdvanced > updates type when 'Property Type' select changes
SearchFiltersAdvanced > updates minPrice/maxPrice when price range changes
SearchFiltersAdvanced > passes city value to CityCombo and updates city via onChange
SearchFiltersAdvanced > updates bedroomsMin when 'Bedrooms (min)' changes
SearchFiltersAdvanced > updates bathroomsMin when 'Bathrooms (min)' changes
SearchFiltersAdvanced > updates furnished and petsAllowed when selects change
SearchFiltersAdvanced > updates areaMin and areaMax when inputs change
SearchFiltersAdvanced > updates availableFrom when date input changes
SearchFiltersSmall > sets price select value based on minPrice/maxPrice
SearchFiltersSmall > updates type when 'Property Type' select changes
SearchFiltersSmall > updates minPrice/maxPrice when price bucket changes
SearchFiltersSmall > passes city value to CityCombo and merges city on change
Section > renders title and children, with spacing when title is present
Section > centers the title when center prop is true
Section > renders without title and without extra margin when title is missing
Select > renders children options
Select > applies className and forwards props
Select > forwards ref to the underlying select element
Select > handles change events
